QuestData.Title: Filthy Animals
QuestData.Description: You probably caught wind of some of them Hecklefang scavengers on the way in - they reek worse than ol' Durty Pete here. Worthless animals! They steal our kills, rummage through our supplies, and worse... they ain't good for eatin'.$B$BGo kill some.$B$BThen kill some more, if you want to.
QuestData.RewardText: Ooooo-oooh aye! The best Hecklefangs are the dead ones.
